    • id

      public TaskId.TriggerBuilder<T> id(String id)
      The ID of this task, same queued ids are replaced.

    • correlationId

      public TaskId.TriggerBuilder<T> correlationId(String correlationId)
      An unique ID which is taken over to a chain/set of tasks. If task is triggered it in a task, this ID is taken over.

    • tag

      public TaskId.TriggerBuilder<T> tag(String tag)

    • state

      public TaskId.TriggerBuilder<T> state(T state)

    • priority

      public TaskId.TriggerBuilder<T> priority(int priority)
      The higher the priority the earlier this task is picked. Same as JMS priority. Default is also 4, like in JMS.
      Parameters:
      priority - custom priority e.g. 0-9, also higher numbers are supported
      Returns:
      this TaskId.TriggerBuilder

    • when

      public TaskId.TriggerBuilder<T> when(OffsetDateTime when)
      synonym for runAt(OffsetDateTime)

      synonym for runAt(OffsetDateTime)

    • waitForSignal

      public TaskId.TriggerBuilder<T> waitForSignal(OffsetDateTime timeout)
      Creates a trigger which waits for an external signal and will run into TriggerStatus.EXPIRED_SIGNAL if no signal happens.
